description:
Anguished cries echo across the battlefield in the wake of Ace`s tragic death. Luffy - paralyzed by grief - must be carried to safety, but Whitebeard summons the strength for one last ferocious attack!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaigun Honbu Houkai! Shirohige Kotobanaki Ikari!
La destruction du quartier général ! La rage sourde de Barbe Blanche !
The Navy Headquarters Falls! Whitebeard`s Unspeakable Wrath!
Штаб-квартира в руинах! Безмолвная ярость Белоуса!
海軍本部崩壊! 白ひげ言葉なき怒り!
